name: Amoebattle
description:
Real Time Strategy on a scale you've never seen before.
Lead your squad of amoebas to battle in this imaginative and acclaimed RTS.

"Succeeds wonderfully at creating a touch-based RTS for iOS." -TouchArcade

"A unique spin on a classic genre, and one that’s more than worth any interested iOS gamer’s time." - 148Apps

"Clearly made by people who genuinely wanted to make something interesting for the platform, and they've succeeded." -Kotaku [Gaming App of the Day]

"Tackles the hard-wired challenges of mobile RTS gaming with elegance and sophistication" -Modojo

"An excellent RTS...something that a lot of RTS fans have dreamed about ever since the iPad was first announced." -TUAW [Daily iPhone App]

"A true gem of a title that earns every part of the price tag attached to it and then some." -Gamezebo


MAJOR WARFARE. MICROSCOPIC SCALE.
The fate of our biological future lies in your hands. Command a squad of amoebas against a fast spreading infection that threatens the microscopic world. Built from the ground up for the mobile touchscreen, Amoebattle delivers a highly unique RTS experience for newcomers and veterans alike.

DIVE INTO THE UNSEEN WORLD
Discover nine types of creatures, from the fast moving Viper to the indestructible Ursa. Journey through the beautiful yet alien landscapes, featuring a remarkable watercolor/pixel hybrid art style.

TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE
Mutate into any other amoeba to fit your playstyle or try new tactics. Turn the tide of battle with powerful Probes, such as the Cryoprobe that slows enemies to a crawl.

ALL THE THRILLS...
Stop the infection and destroy its source in the varied and intense twelve mission campaign. Show your dominance by conquering the challenging Game Center Achievements.

AND ALL THE FRILLS
Universal, iCloud Enabled, iPad & iPhone Retina Display, intuitive Multi-Touch controls, and AMI - your neighborhood friendly software assistant.

Amoebattle brings the action and excitement of the RTS to the iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch to deliver an experience unlike anything else.
